channel.title: Help with COMPILE and RUNSERVER!
channel.description:
Okay...I am having a little trouble getting my compiler and my runserver to start working, and I am running the newest version of Java (5.0 update 9), and if anyone can copy and paste the right edited compiler and runserver information for me I would really appreaciate it.
Also when I hit RUNSERVER it says:
Note:stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note:Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. ---Project16 V.6 by Wolf |-Enable-| ---
It says the same thing when I hit COMPILE too.
Thank You.

item.title: Help with COMPILE and RUNSERVER!
item.dc:creator: @p_k_j00 p k j00
item.description:
@p_k_j00 wrote:

you need to open mopar and leave the ip blank

Read full topic

item.title: Help with COMPILE and RUNSERVER!

item.description:
@d4rk_elf wrote:

Okay but when I click runserver isn’t it suppost to start moparscape from there, or do I go and open moparscape?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @PKOwner PKOwner
item.description:
@PKOwner wrote:

its not an error…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with COMPILE and RUNSERVER!
item.dc:creator: @Something_all_OVer Something all OVer
item.description:
@Something_all_OVer wrote:

Thats not a error its what it should say if its going alright.

Note:stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note:Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. ---Project16 V.6 by Wolf |-Enable-| ---

As you can see the 3rd line is same as saying its starting up ready for you to play.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with COMPILE and RUNSERVER!
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

[glow=red,2,300]Compiler[/glow]

@echo off COLOR 08 title Doublescape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause

[glow=gre,2,300]Runserver[/glow]

@echo off title TestScape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

If any dont work post also if compiler dont work change all the

jdk1.5.0_06

To jdk1.5.0_09

Read full topic

item.title: Help with COMPILE and RUNSERVER!

item.description:
@d4rk_elf wrote:

Okay…I am having a little trouble getting my compiler and my runserver to start working, and I am running the newest version of Java (5.0 update 9), and if anyone can copy and paste the right edited compiler and runserver information for me I would really appreaciate it.

Note:Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
